introduction: [Continuous/Equip] Guided by the Seer, people discovered this magical axe.
effect: Negate the equipped monster’s attributes; it cannot use skills. ATK and DEF +3.

introduction: The Seer said some must be offered for prosperity.
effect: Destroy 1 of your monsters; draw 3 cards.

introduction: The Seer said: “All in—what’s there to fear?”
effect: All of your monsters that can attack perform one Joint Attack; ATK equals the sum of their ATK. The Joint Attack does not trigger any opponent effects. Monsters that joined the Joint Attack cannot attack again this turn.
If you control a monster, you may perform two additional Summons.
All your monsters get ATK + (your number of monsters). All opponent monsters get DEF + (their number of monsters). Battle damage this turn is doubled.
Additionally Normal Summon up to two monsters. At the end of this turn, if they are still on the field, return them to your hand.
Inflict 10 damage to the opponent.
ATK +1; DEF +4.
Discard 1 card (from hand or field) or remove 1 Energy; draw 2 cards.

introduction: [Continuous] A once-in-a-century friendly goblin, slain by its kin and turned spirit.
effect: After use, during your turn treat this as a Monster card: Spirit-kind, ATK 4, DEF 4.

introduction: [Continuous] The Seer said nothing—just quietly wrote a book.
effect: During the turn this card leaves the field, you may play up to three additional Prophecies.
Additionally Summon 1 monster, then attach this card to it as 1 Energy.
The opponent chooses and destroys one of your monsters. Then draw until you have 5 cards in hand.
(Cannot be used the turn it is set; and you must have ≥8 total cards in hand + on your field.) Discard all cards from your hand and field; destroy all opponent cards on the field; then draw 5 cards.
Look at one opponent set card and two cards in their hand; then return one set card to their hand.
Additionally Summon 1 monster (required Energy −1), then discard 1 random card.
Choose a monster; it gains +1 Energy. If it is [Heavenly-kind], it gains +1 additional Energy.
During the Set phase, when you Summon a high-level monster: required Energy −2.
Additionally Summon a level-0 monster; all your monsters’ base ATK becomes the (rounded-up) average of their base ATK.

introduction: [Quick] The Seer foretold your early arrival.
effect: Additionally flip-Summon 1 monster. A monster flip-Summoned this way is unaffected by opponent card effects this turn.

introduction: [Continuous] The Seer found a cave akin to a black hole.
effect: At End Phase, you may place any number of monsters from your hand or field onto this card. During the Set phase, you may Summon up to two monsters from this card (the first counts as a Normal Summon, the second as an additional Summon). (Cards placed on this card are not considered on the field.)
(Use only if you control no monsters.) [Directly Summon] one level ≤3 monster from your discard.

introduction: An ill-timed cold snap and hunger arrive together.
responsive_effect: When the opponent’s last monster on the field is destroyed: destroy 2 cards from their hand or 1 Prophecy card.
At the end of your turn: name a card. If the opponent has it in hand or set, they must discard it. Then keep naming until you miss.

effect: You may play one additional Prophecy next; if it resolves successfully, you may flip a set Prophecy on the field and use it as an additional Prophecy.
responsive_effect: After a [Chain] occurs on your turn: Prophecy plays this turn are unlimited.
After you perform an additional Summon this turn: set one of your monsters face-down as a Monster Egg, then take two cards from the opponent’s hand.

effect: Discard 1 card; return one opponent card on the field to their hand.
responsive_effect: After an opponent monster finishes an attack: one of your monsters makes an attack.
When the opponent declares an attack: negate that attack; return a random opponent face-up card to their hand.

When you draw a card: let the opponent guess its type (Monster/Prophecy). If they guess wrong, you may discard that draw and take one card from their hand or set zone; if they guess right, you may [Directly Summon] or use that card.

effect: If you control exactly three monsters, choose one: (1) draw 3 cards; (2) destroy all opponent Prophecies.
responsive_effect: When the opponent declares an attack and you control exactly three monsters: change the attack target to any of your monsters, then set this card face-down again.
After the opponent declares an attack: destroy 1 opponent Monster card.
When the opponent declares an attack: negate that attack; the attacked monster may pay 1 Energy to destroy one opponent monster.
(Once per turn) when you take damage from a card effect: choose 1 card in your discard and add it to your hand.
After the opponent draws: take that card or take one of their hand cards.

effect: Choose an opponent monster with a Normal Attribute and destroy it.
responsive_effect: When the opponent plays a Prophecy: if you control no other Prophecies besides this, you may either negate and destroy that Prophecy, or destroy a different Prophecy.

introduction: Holy light descends as heaven’s punishment—the Mother Earth’s disdain foretold.
responsive_effect: When a monster on the field is destroyed by battle: inflict damage to the opponent equal to twice that monster’s DEF.
When one of your monsters is destroyed by battle: next turn all your monsters get ATK + (the battle damage dealt).
When one of your monsters is targeted for effect destruction: cancel that destruction and look at all cards in the opponent’s hand.

effect: Pay 2 Energy and discard 1 card: destroy 1 opponent card on the field.
responsive_effect: When a [Chain] occurs: this card gains +1 Energy.
When you draw by a triggered effect: all battle damage you deal this turn is +10.
When you declare an attack: that attack gets +3 ATK and does not trigger opponent effects or get affected by their Continuous Prophecies; that monster refreshes its skill-use count.
When your hand cards are discarded by a card effect: gain 3 Energy to distribute among your field.
When the opponent issues an attack command: destroy one of your monsters; choose a monster you control—it gains +15 ATK and immediately makes one attack.

introduction: Who could refuse an adorable kitten?
effect: Choose one of your level ≤2 monsters; it attacks the opponent player directly.
Choose one monster on the field; it gets +10 ATK until end of turn.
responsive_effect: When one of your monsters is attacked: that monster gets +10 DEF until end of turn.

effect: Choose a monster; its next attack this turn gets +15 ATK. After that attack, you lose 5 Faith.

introduction: At the perfect moment the Seer sounded the horn of victory.
effect: All your monsters: any ATK/DEF buffs they receive this turn are doubled.
responsive_effect: When the opponent declares an attack: all your monsters get +5 DEF this turn.

effect: Choose a monster you control; it can attack two additional times this turn.
responsive_effect: When you declare an attack: another of your monsters gets +10 ATK for its next attack this turn.

effect: Discard your entire hand; keep drawing and revealing until you have drawn 2 Monster cards.
All your monsters get +3 DEF.
This turn, all your monsters get +5 ATK.
Deal 5 damage to the opponent for each monster you control.
Gain +2 Energy, randomly distributed among your monsters.
You may additionally use one Prophecy that has been set since your previous turn (non-Equip, non-Continuous); that Prophecy’s effect resolves twice.

responsive_effect: After you Summon a high-level monster: randomly destroy one opponent face-up card.

effect: Choose a level-0 [Fish-kind] (or [Merfolk], or Water-attribute) monster; its next attack has ATK ×3.
Equipped monster gets +5 ATK and +5 DEF. At each End Phase, remove 1 Energy from your field; otherwise destroy this card.
All Energy on both sides converges onto one monster you control.
The equipped monster gains the skill: [Mind Haze] Gain control of an opponent monster for 1 turn. (If the controlled monster can attack the player directly, it may do so.)
You take 10 damage; the opponent takes 5 damage; one of your monsters gains +3 Energy.
responsive_effect: When the opponent spends more than 2 Energy at once: they take 20 damage and you take 5 damage.

effect: Remove 1 Energy from your field; treat it as a monster ATK 15 / DEF 0 that makes one attack. (If the opponent controls no monsters or Monster Eggs, it may attack directly.)

responsive_effect: When you would take effect damage: if ≤5, prevent it and put 1 Energy on this card; if >5, reduce it by 5.
When you draw a Monster card: take 5 damage, then [Directly Summon] it. It is unaffected by opponent card effects this turn.

When the attacked opponent monster is not destroyed by battle: if your attacker’s ATK exceeds that target’s original DEF, destroy that monster, recalculate battle damage (as effect damage), and gain its Energy.
When you would take effect damage: negate it and deal the same amount to the opponent.

effect: ATK +3; DEF +2.
responsive_effect: When you take damage: the equipped monster gains +1 Energy.
When the opponent declares an attack: negate the attack; the attacked monster pays 1 Energy to deal 14 damage to the opponent.
When you take battle damage: discard X cards; draw (X + 2) cards.
After you deal damage to the opponent: all effect damage they take this turn is doubled.
At the end of your turn: deal 5 damage to the opponent.

effect: Condition: You may activate this only if last turn one of your X-kind monsters was destroyed by battle by a Y-kind monster.
responsive_effect: When your X-kind fights a Y-kind: ATK +5.
When one of your monsters gains Energy: for its next two attacks, it gets +2 ATK; this turn it may attack one additional time and use its skill one additional time.
After you spend Energy: one opponent monster permanently loses all skills, attributes, and effects.

effect: All your monsters gain +1 Energy; then remove all Energy from all monsters; each monster gains ATK + (5 × the Energy it removed).

responsive_effect: When a card on the field is flipped: negate its effect and destroy that card.

effect: At each End Phase, the equipped monster gains +1 Energy; if the opponent controls no set cards, it gains +1 more.
Remove 1 Energy from the field; swap this card with a Prophecy in your discard and immediately use that Prophecy.
(Once per turn) Remove 2 Energy from your field (excluding Energy on this card) to destroy 1 opponent card; then put +1 Energy on this card.
Choose one monster; it gets +3 ATK and the battle damage it deals this turn is doubled.

Choose one of your monsters: it gains +1 Energy; its next attack gets +5 ATK. After that attack resolves, the opponent takes the same amount of battle damage again (as effect damage), then the opponent draws 2 cards.

responsive_effect: When the opponent declares an attack: pay 1 Energy to negate that attack and destroy the attacking monster; if destroyed, recover 3 Faith.

When one of your monsters is destroyed by an effect: its Energy is not absorbed; instead, attach it to this card and this card persists temporarily. At the end of the turn, [Directly Summon] that monster to your field, return its Energy to it and give it +1 extra Energy; then destroy this card and attach it to that monster as Energy.

effect: Destroy one of your monsters. Choose another of your monsters; it gains +5 ATK and Energy + (1 + the destroyed monster’s Energy).
